title: I know this font but i just can't find it. Your help would be appreciated. :)
author: Gman779

comments.content: It's like a weight of [Antique Olive Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826073706/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/antique-olive/) that doesn't (legitimately) exist. Perhaps a knockoff?
